title: What are the principles and techniques of magnetism in healing?
first_phrase: This text provides insights into magnetism and how it can be used to heal. It explains various techniques that can be used to increase magnetic force and influence. The text also explores the impact of the sun and moon on magnetism and how to orient a bed for maximum healing effect. The last 200 tokens of the text delve into practical aspects of magnetism and answer questions such as, 'Is it good to magnetize often?' and 'What should a magnetizer do when called to a patient's bed?'

last_phrase: In conclusion, it is important to recognize that magnetism can have a positive effect on many conditions, especially those related to nerves and mental health. However, it is crucial to carefully determine the number and repetition of passes depending on the specific disease, as well as the orientation of the patient's bed in relation to the sun. Attention should be given to the concentration of magnetic currents in different parts of the body and the necessary direction of the current should be determined by the practitioner's focused thoughts. Overall, magnetism can bring relief to patients when appropriately applied with careful consideration of the individual's needs.
